proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 300 hours a year on manual proposals. Here's where it vanishes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Each manual proposal pulls Shida's designers away for hours. Automate it in 47 seconds instead.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are not just inefficiencies; they are direct losses impacting Shida's growth.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Creating each proposal takes 5 hours. That's 20 hours a week lost to paperwork instead of design work.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Every delayed proposal risks a lost client. Shida misses out on 10 deals a year due to slow proposal turnaround.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals often miss branding marks. This inconsistency costs Shida credibility and 5% of potential deals.

problems.title: Designer Burnout
problems.description: Designers spend 20% of their time on proposals. This contributes to burnout and decreases creative output by 15%.

problems.title: Revisions Overload
problems.description: Proposal revisions take 2 additional hours each. With 30 revisions a year, that's 60 hours of wasted effort.

problems.title: Tracking Blind Spot
problems.description: No tracking means missed follow-ups. This could result in a 10% drop in conversion rates annually.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these losses with seamless, automated efficiency.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Current process: 5 hours per proposal. With our system: complete proposals in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual branding often fails. Our system ensures every proposal is perfectly on-brand, every time.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot Support
solutions.description: Manual client queries take hours to address. Our AI chatbot handles them instantly, freeing your team.

solutions.title: Real-time Tracking
solutions.description: Current method lacks follow-up insights. Our system tracks client interactions for timely follow-ups.

solutions.title: Effortless Revisions
solutions.description: Revisions take hours. Our system allows instant edits and updates, saving precious time.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Brand Presence with Shida's Design Excellence.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our tailored design solutions will elevate your brand visibility and drive customer engagement. Let's create impactful visuals that resonate with your audience.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is losing potential revenue due to current challenges.

problems.title: Outdated Branding
problems.description: Your brand lacks a modern touch. This results in losing appeal to younger demographics, costing you potential market share.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor leaving your site without converting is lost revenue. Your current design fails to guide users effectively.

problems.title: Inconsistent Visual Identity
problems.description: A fragmented visual identity confuses customers. This inconsistency leads to brand disloyalty, affecting customer retention.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: A complex user interface frustrates users. This leads to high bounce rates and missed opportunities for engagement.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Collateral
problems.description: Your marketing materials lack impact. This diminishes your competitive edge in the market, leading to reduced lead generation.

problems.title: Neglected Social Media Presence
problems.description: An inactive social presence means missed interactions. This results in lower brand awareness and weaker customer connections.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions directly address these losses, transforming them into opportunities.

solutions.title: Brand Redesign
solutions.description: We revitalize your brand identity to captivate and engage. This will enhance market appeal and increase customer loyalty.

solutions.title: Website Optimization
solutions.description: Streamlined design to improve navigation and user flow. This enhances user experience and boosts conversion rates.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Development
solutions.description: Creating impactful materials to strengthen your marketing campaigns. This will improve lead generation and brand perception.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: Enhancing your social presence to foster connections and brand awareness. This will drive engagement and build a loyal customer base.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida stands out with professional expertise and a proven track record.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: We have a history of transforming brands and driving tangible results for our clients.

whyUsCards.title: Customer-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are tailored to meet your unique business needs, ensuring your goals are our priorities.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We bring fresh ideas and creative solutions that set you apart from the competition.

whyUsCards.title: Dedicated Support
whyUsCards.description: Our team is committed to your success, offering consistent communication and support.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our expert team is committed to your success.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads our strategy and client relationships with a focus on driving impactful results. His expertise ensures your brand's growth and success.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We begin by understanding your brand and market.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Crafting a comprehensive design strategy tailored for you.

process.title: Design & Implementation
process.description: Executing the design plan with precision and creativity.

process.title: Launch & Optimize
process.description: Ensuring a successful launch and ongoing optimization.

pricing.name: Basic
pricing.description: Essential design services to get you started.

pricing.description: Comprehensive design solutions for growing businesses.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to elevate Acme Corp's brand?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can transform your business. Reach out for a conversation.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
